channel.title: Host a server with verizon fios?
channel.description: IS it possible to host a server with verizon fios because i use no-ip and have my server running and everything but it says its offline, so i go to use uttorent to portforward it with and it still doesnt work and i did start the server before running uttorent, I have the ports open in firewall udp and tcp. So do i have to portforward with a verizon fios router/modem? because its kinda confusing can anyone help?

item.title: Host a server with verizon fios?
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

Yeah you have to port forward for it to work, but yeah, it works with FiOS.

Read full topic
item.source: Host a server with verizon fios?
